thread.title: UBNT SHAREHOLDER ALERT: The Law Offices of Vincent Wong Notifies Investors of an Investigation Involving Possible Securities Fraud Violations by the Board of Directors of Ubiquiti Networks, Inc.

author: cnbc.com
title: UBNT SHAREHOLDER ALERT: The Law Offices of Vincent Wong Notifies Investors of an Investigation Involving Possible Securities Fraud Violations by the Board of Directors of Ubiquiti Networks, Inc.

organizations.name: board of directors of ubiquiti networks, inc

text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- The Law Offices of Vincent Wong notifies investors of an investigation concerning whether Ubiquiti Networks, Inc. (“Ubiquiti” or the “Company”) (NASDAQ:UBNT) violated federal securities laws.
Click here to learn about the case: http://docs.wongesq.com/UBNT-Info-Request-Form-1833 . There is no cost or obligation to you.
On February 20, 2018, Ubiquiti revealed that it had received a subpoena from the Securities and Exchange Commission “requesting documents and information relating to a range of topics including metrics relating to the Ubiquiti Community, accounting practices, financial information, auditors, international trade practices, and relationships with distributors and various other third parties.” Upon this news shares of Ubiquiti fell from a close of $74.04 per share on February 16, 2018, to a close of $55.28 on February 20, 2018.
To learn more about the investigation of Ubiquiti contact Vincent Wong, Esq. either via email vw@wongesq.com , by telephone at 212.425.1140, or visit http://docs.wongesq.com/UBNT-Info-Request-Form-1833 .
Vincent Wong, Esq. is an experienced attorney that has represented investors in securities litigations involving financial fraud and violations of shareholder rights. Attorney advertising. Prior results do not guarantee similar outcomes.
View source version on businesswire.com : http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180223005552/en/
